entry.string: Overview
entry.translation: Oferfeeoo

entry.string: What is it?
entry.translation: Vhet is it?

entry.string: The Roles module lets you manage users and groups on your site. Roles are representations of users and the different groups they can belong to.
entry.translation: Zee Rules mudoole-a lets yuoo munege-a oosers und gruoops oon yuoor seete-a. Rules ere-a representeshuns ooff users und zee deefffferent gruoops zeey cun belung tu.

entry.string: Roles can be members of other roles, to any degree. You can, for instance, use roles to represent a company's organization chart, or the set of classes at a university. A role can be a member of as many other roles as you like (as long as the parents are groups).
entry.translation: Rules cun be-a meemburs ooff oozeer rules, tu uny degree-a. Yuoo cun, fur instunce-a, use-a rules tu represent a cumpuny's oorguneezeshun chert, oor zee set ooff clesses et a uneefersity. Bork bork bork! A rule-a cun be-a a meembur ooff es muny oozeer rules es yuoo leeke-a (es lung es zee perents ere-a gruoops).

entry.string: Roles can be assigned privileges. By doing so, you define what a given role may or may not do on the site. You can use the test functionality of the Roles module to see what parts of the site a role with a given set of privileges has access to.
entry.translation: Rules cun be-a esseegned preefileges. By dueeng su, yuoo deffeene-a vhet a geefee rule-a mey oor mey nut du oon zee seete-a. Yuoo cun use-a zee test fooncshuneleety ooff zee Rules mudoole-a tu see-a vhet perts ooff zee seete-a a rule-a veet a geefee set ooff preefileges hes eccess tu.

entry.string: Roles have inheritance. A role inherits all the privileges of all of its parents, but can override them. If you give a group editing privileges, for instance, any other role that is a member of that group inherits the editing privileges. If you want to restrict the privileges of some of the members, simply assign them a different set of privileges (say reading), and the privileges of the parent will be overridden.
entry.translation: Rules hefe-a eenheritunce-a. A rule-a inhereets ell zee preefileges ooff ell ooff its perents, boot cun ooferreede-a zeem. Iff yuoo geefe-a a gruoop ideeting preefileges, fur instunce-a, uny oozeer rule-a thet is a meembur ooff thet gruoop inhereets zee ideeting preefileges. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Iff yuoo vunt tu restreect zee preefileges ooff sume-a ooff zee meemburs, seemply esseegn zeem a deefffferent set ooff preefileges (sey reedeeng), und zee preefileges ooff zee perent veell be-a ooferreeddee.

entry.string: How to use it?
entry.translation: Hoo tu use-a it?

entry.string: The roles on your site are arranged in a tree. At the top of the tree is a role called Everybody, which represents the "group of all groups" on your site. Every user and every group is a member or descendent of Everybody.
entry.translation: Zee rules oon yuoor seete-a ere-a errunged in a tree-a. Et zee tup ooff zee tree-a is a rule-a celled Eferybudy, vheech represents zee "gruoop ooff ell gruoops" oon yuoor seete-a. Ifery user und ifery gruoop is a meembur oor descendent ooff Iferybudy. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Xaraya also comes preconfigured with a minimal set of roles that are loaded when you run the installer. This configuration is shown below:
entry.translation: Xereya elsu cumes precunffeegoored veet a meenimel set ooff rules thet ere-a lueded vhee yuoo roon zee insteller. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! Thees cunffeegooreshun is shoon beloo:

entry.string: Everybody: is the role containing all other roles. This role has no access privileges.
entry.translation: Eferybudy: is zee rule-a cunteeening ell oozeer rules. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Thees rule-a hes nu eccess preefileges. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Anonymous: a user that represents any unregistered users on your site. This role is initially configured with privileges only to access the front page of the site and the login block.
entry.translation: Ununymuoos: a user thet represents uny unregeestered users oon yuoor seete-a. Thees rule-a is ineetielly cunffeegoored veet preefileges oonly tu eccess zee frunt pege-a ooff zee seete-a und zee lugeen bluck.

entry.string: Administrators: a group that has administration privileges.
entry.translation: Edmeenistreturs: a gruoop thet hes edmeenistreshun preefileges. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Admin: a member of Administrators. This is the Admin role you create with the Xaraya installer.
entry.translation: Edmeen: a meembur ooff Edmeenistreturs. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Thees is zee Edmeen rule-a yuoo creete-a veet zee Xereya insteller. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: Users: a group that normally holds registered users of the site. N.B.: this role does not come preconfigured with any privileges. Its members will not have access to the site until you assign some privileges.
entry.translation: Oosers: a gruoop thet nurmelly hulds regeestered users ooff zee seete-a. N.B.: thees rule-a dues nut cume-a precunffeegoored veet uny preefileges. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Its meemburs veell nut hefe-a eccess tu zee seete-a unteel yuoo esseegn sume-a preefileges. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: The preconfigured roles cannot be changed or removed. You can, however, add members to them. You can also define as many more roles in the tree as you wish in whatever configuration you choose.
entry.translation: Zee precunffeegoored rules cunnut be-a chunged oor remufed. Bork bork bork! Yuoo cun, hooefer, edd meemburs tu zeem. Yuoo cun elsu deffeene-a es muny mure-a rules in zee tree-a es yuoo veesh in vhetefer cunffeegooreshun yuoo chuuse-a.

entry.string: Always keep in mind: When you create a role, until you've assigned it some privileges, it will only have those privileges it inherits from its parents.
entry.translation: Elveys keep in meend: Vhee yuoo creete-a a rule-a, unteel yuoo'fe-a esseegned it sume-a preefileges, it veell oonly hefe-a thuse-a preefileges it inhereets frum its perents. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Included Blocks
entry.translation: Inclooded Blucks

entry.string: Login Block allows users to login
entry.translation: Lugeen Bluck elloos users tu lugeen

entry.string: Online Block shows the number visiting your site right now.
entry.translation: Onleene-a Bluck shoos zee noomber feesiting yuoor seete-a reeght noo.

entry.string: Included Hooks
entry.translation: Inclooded Huuks

entry.string: The roles module allows the use of the User Menu hook which will allow users to set values to further enhance their visit.
entry.translation: Zee rules mudoole-a elloos zee use-a ooff zee User Menoo huuk vheech veell elloo users tu set felooes tu foorzeer inhunce-a zeeur feesit. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found in
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond in

entry.string: RFC-30
entry.translation: RFC-30
